A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is nothing in this movie that makes sense. Reviewers from YouTube come up with better story and plot than this multi million dollar waste of time. Effects are not everything and negative feedback does not mean trolling. Ryan Johnson should be ashamed\, Mark Hamill too for agreeing to act like he did. This is not only a weak star wars movie\, is a weak movie in general. Fan fiction makes more sense. 1.5 star for effects only.
